report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple IBM QRadar Vulnerabilities
chapter_title: Severity

report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple IBM QRadar Vulnerabilities
text: IBM QRadar 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple IBM QRadar Vulnerabilities
text: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 stores potentially sensitive information in log files that could be read by an user with access to creating domains.

report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple IBM QRadar Vulnerabilities
text: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 in some senarios may reveal authorized service tokens to other QRadar users.

report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple IBM QRadar Vulnerabilities
text: IBM QRadar 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 could allow a malicious actor to impersonate an actor due to key exchange without entity authentication.

report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple IBM QRadar Vulnerabilities
text: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 allows for users to access information across tenant and domain boundaries in some situations.

report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple IBM QRadar Vulnerabilities
text: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 in some situations may not automatically log users out after they exceede their idle timeout.

report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple IBM QRadar Vulnerabilities
text: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3, 7.4, and 7.5 could allow an authenticated user to obtain sensitive information from another users dashboard providing the dashboard ID of that user.

report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple IBM QRadar Vulnerabilities
chapter_title: Impact
text: Cross-Site Scripting Information Disclosure Security Bypass

report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple IBM QRadar Vulnerabilities
chapter_title: CVE

chapter_title: Affected Products
text: IBM QRadar SIEM 7.3.3 IBM QRadar SIEM 7.4.3 IBM QRadar SIEM 7.5.0

report_title: Rewterz Threat Advisory Multiple IBM QRadar Vulnerabilities
chapter_title: Remediation
